title: Be Faithful With The Small Things | Victoria Osteen
itunes:title: Be Faithful With The Small Things | Victoria Osteen
description:
Oftentimes we overlook the small things in life because we can’t see their importance. But in order for God to increase us, we have to learn to be faithful with everything He’s given us. When you learn to handle the small things, God will use them to prepare you for the great things He has in store.


Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
